timeline.bodyText: You don't need the parens, just .length would do.
timeline.author: calancha
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -547,7 +547,7 @@
   if verb == 'be' && value == ''
     raise "Output has more than one line: #{output}" unless output.split("\n").length == 1
   elsif verb == 'be'
-    raise "Output value not found : #{output}" unless output.split("\n") > 1
+    raise "Output value not found : #{output}" unless output.split("\n").length() > 1

replies.bodyText: right... for next resync between branches
replies.author: Bischoff
